name: Fiksiki Jumper: Tap and Jump
description:
The Fixies Jumper is a game for boys and girls!
Help the characters to climp up to the top! By the way, is there really a top anywhere? We couldn't get to it, can you?

So Nolik, Simka and Verda came up with a new fantastic idea - they want to jump up on the buses! Join them in this game!
Jump higher and higher evey time, set your new records and try not to fall down.
Isn't it fun and against the rules? That's right and that's cool!

What's in the game:
- Play by different characters and jump up from bus to bus
- Choose cool outfits
- Climb up to the TOP!

Colorful interface, bright animation, easy control - you will absolutely like it!
Tap the screen and the characte wil jump. Choose a right moment for your tap, so you will not be hit by bus.
The game is for kids from 2 to 7 and even older if they like to jump!

We produced a lot of other games, which you may have heard of:
Kid-e-Cats Picnic
Kid-e-Cats Shop
The Fixies Top Secret
The Fixies Town
The Fixies Cake Bakery
The Fixies Dream House
The Fixies Shop

Download the game to have fun right away!
